item.title: Asset Management for PHP
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Looking for one more asset management tool to use? Check out assetic: [sourcecode lang=”php”] use AsseticAssetAssetCollection; use AsseticAssetFileAsset; use AsseticAssetGlobAsset; $js = new AssetCollection( [ new GlobAsset(‘/path/to/js/*’), new FileAsset(‘/path/to/another.js’), ] ); echo $js->dump(); [/sourcecode]
item.content:encoded:
Looking for one more asset management tool to use? Check out assetic:

[sourcecode lang=”php”]
use AsseticAssetAssetCollection;
use AsseticAssetFileAsset;
use AsseticAssetGlobAsset;

$js = new AssetCollection( [
new GlobAsset(‘/path/to/js/*’),
new FileAsset(‘/path/to/another.js’),
] );

echo $js->dump();
[/sourcecode]
